title: Salsa Night Workshop
description: Dive into the rhythm of salsa and learn new moves in a fun and energetic environment. Perfect for all levels!

title: Contemporary Dance Class
description: Explore the art of expression with a contemporary dance session led by professional instructors.

title: Ballet Basics for Beginners
description: Step into the world of ballet with a graceful introduction to the fundamentals. No experience needed!

title: Hip-Hop Masterclass
description: Unleash your energy with dynamic hip-hop choreography. Learn from the best and elevate your style!

title: Couples' Dance Evening
description: Spend a romantic evening learning elegant ballroom moves with your partner.

title: Jazz Funk Fusion
description: Blend the precision of jazz with the funk of street styles in this high-energy dance session.

title: Kids' Dance Adventure
description: A fun-filled dance class designed to spark creativity and joy in young movers.

title: Latin Dance Party
description: Feel the heat of Latin rhythms as you learn to dance salsa, bachata.

title: Dance Fitness Bootcamp
description: Get your heart pumping with a workout that combines dance and fitness.
